1177278032974925800,Thu Sep 26 17:45:30 +0000 2019,They are encased in a skin like covering called a cuticle, which they must periodically shed and regrow.
1177278029078433800,Thu Sep 26 17:45:29 +0000 2019,Tardigrades are not closely related to anything else on earth; they belong to their very own phylum, Tardigrada.
